meanings.definition: Resembling a tree in form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The bushes in the garden had an arborescent appearance.
meanings.sent2: The arborescent branches of the oak tree reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent3: The arborescent shrub seemed to be trying to hug the nearby flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, styled in an arborescent manner, cascaded down her back like a waterfall of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The arborescent pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel like a peaceful forest.

meanings.definition: Growing or branching like a tree.
meanings.sent1: The river had an arborescent flow, splitting into smaller streams.
meanings.sent2: The plant's arborescent growth reached out in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The arborescent vines in the jungle seemed to be playing a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts grew in an arborescent manner, branching out into various ideas.
meanings.sent5: The city's roads spread out in an arborescent pattern, resembling a tree from above.
